ilog.concert

Interface IloQuadIntExpr

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IloIntExpr, IloNumExpr
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IloLQIntExpr

    public interface IloQuadIntExpr
extends IloIntExpr
    A quadratic expression.

    A quadratic expression represents a sum of quadratic terms of the form qexp = sum q_ij * x_i * x_j.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(IloQuadIntExpr qexpr)
      Adds all terms found in the specified quadratic expression to the invoking object.
      void addTerm(int coef, IloIntVar var1, IloIntVar var2)
      Adds the new term coef * var1 * var2 to the invoking quadratic expression.
      void addTerms(int[] coef, IloIntVar[] var1, IloIntVar[] var2)
      Adds the terms specified by sum_i (coef[i] * var1[i] * var2[i]) to the invoking quadratic expression.
      void addTerms(int[] coef, IloIntVar[] var1, IloIntVar[] var2, int start, int num)
      Adds the terms specified by sum_i (coef[i] * var1[i] * var2[i]) to the invoking quadratic expression, for the indices i from start to start + num-1.
      void clear()
      Removes all quadratic terms from the invoking object.
      IloQuadIntExprIterator quadIterator()
      Returns an iterator over the quadratic terms in the invoking quadratic expression.
      void remove(IloIntVar var)
      Removes all terms that use var from the invoking quadratic expression.
      void remove(IloIntVar[] var)
      Removes all terms that use a variable of the specified array from the invoking quadratic expression.
      void remove(IloIntVar[] var, int start, int num)
      Removes all terms that use a variable var[i] from the invoking quadratic expression, for the indices i from start to start + num-1.
